src:
Kim Kardashian pridala svoju dcéru na fotku cez Photoshop a všetci sa jej smejú. Vzniklo množstvo vtipných obrázkov
02 Nov 2019, 12:52 by Viktor Kniš

Modelka a podnikateľka síce situáciu v popise pod fotkou vysvetlila, fanúšikom to však v žiadnom prípade nestačilo.

Aj rodina Kanyeho Westa oslavovala obľúbený americký sviatok v maskách – spoločne sa prezliekli za postavy z animovanej rozprávky Filnstonovci.



Na tom by nebolo nič divné, Westovcom sa už tradične podarilo internet zaujať vďaka okolnostiam, za ktorých vznikla fotka umiestnená na Twitteri a Instagrame. Keď Kim Kardashian na svoje sociálne siete pridala snímku, vedeli sme, že dostane priestor ľudová tvorivosť. 



V popise prezradila, že veľký ružový dinosaurus je Kanye West a dôvod, prečo jej dcéra bola na fotku pridaná cez Pohotoshop je, že sa bála svojho otca v halloweenskom obleku. Kim fotografovi za dobrú prácu pri upravovaní rodinnej fotografie poďakovala, sledovatelia však majú opačný názor. 






Našli sa aj takí, ktorí to spočítali Kanyemu Westovi. Pokúsili sa znázorniť, že sa skutočne na Dina z Flinstonovcov podobá, teda minimálne tvarom hlavy. Fanúšikovia sa zabávajú aj na tom, že reálny vzhľad s hlavou rapera a telom dinosaura by mohol malú Chicago vystrašiť ešte viac.










ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ
text:
Kim Kardashian added her daughter to a photo through Photoshop and everyone laughs at her. Many funny pictures were created
02 Nov 2019, 12:52 by Viktor Kniš

The model and the entrepreneur explained the situation in the description below the photo, but it was not enough for the fans.

The Kanye West family also celebrated America's favorite holiday in masks - together they changed themselves as characters from the animated fairy tale Filnston.



There would be nothing strange about this, as Wests have traditionally captivated the Internet thanks to the circumstances under which a photo was posted on Twitter and Instagram. When Kim Kardashian added a picture to her social networking sites, we knew that folk creativity would be given space.



In the description she revealed that the big pink dinosaur was Kanye West and the reason why her daughter was added to the photo through Pohotoshop is because she was afraid of her father in a Halloween suit. Kim thanked the photographer for the good work in editing family photography, but the followers have the opposite view.






There were also those who counted Kanye West. They tried to show that he truly resembles Dina of the Flinston, at least the shape of his head. Fans are also concerned that a real look with the rapper's head and the body of a dinosaur could scare the little Chicago even more.
